title: The Norman Gunston show 3
creator_credit: Simon Francis and Total Film & Television
brief_description: The Norman Gunston show volume three, features highlights from the television series “The Norman Gunston show”, aired in 1993. Comedian Garry McDonald appears in character as Norman Gunston, a guileless interviewer and performer with a variety/entertainment show. Interviewees on this disc include: Ian Botham, Lionel Ritchie, David Faustino, Tim Allen, Dolph Lundgren and two members of the rock band Guns n Roses. At the opening of David Williamson’s new play, Gunston interviews Michael York, Michael Gross and the playwright. Also features one song from music group Mahotella Queens as well as Gunston’s musical rendition of “Unforgettable”.
